posts.post_content:
A wonderful, hilarious response to [Sphinx's Revelation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sphinx's Revelation).  
  
As a Turbofog player, this saddens me; as a Naya aggro player, I am heartful of this.  
So much cognitive dissonance!
